description: Job descriptionGENERAL ROLE DESCRIPTION       BORN North America are looking for a Senior Ecommerce Project Manager to join their award winning ecommerce team reporting into Director of Ecommerce Projects. The purpose of the role is to manage multiple complex ecommerce projects from the scoping stage through to delivery. You will liaise closely with the client updating them on the progress of work while overseeing a team of on-site and offshore information architects, designers, developers and testers executing the work.   This role will suit someone who is flexible, dynamic and experienced in stakeholder management, as the role will require working on a variety of different projects.        KEY RESPONSIBILITIES    ****eCommerce experience is a must   A qualified Project Manager has 3-5 years experience managing the delivery of technology solutions to Clients. They oversee the full lifecycle of a software development project using Agile methodologies. This includes managing the project scope and priorities, ensuring project transparency and working with the technical team to deliver functionality to meet client acceptance criteria.       Responsibilities:      Developing a project plan conveying the continuous delivery of project outcomes from the project solution teams.   Developing a financial view of the project in terms of cost and duration.   Partnering with an internal technical lead and client teams to identify the various roles required by the project to meet project delivery goals.   Consulting with the client on best practices and processes for delivering and maintaining solutions.   Managing distributed development teams.   Collaborating with business sponsors, business owners, analysts, developers and testing teams.   Identifying and quickly resolving project roadblocks.   Managing risks and issues related to projects.   Facilitating scope management across the project.   Leading the team in the identification of project roles and responsibilities.   Developing remedies to problems and issues by bringing the right people into the resolution process at the right time.   Anticipating problems and managing the risks related to the project.   Providing the Project Steering Board with project overview and status.   Providing project and release statuses back to Project Sponsor and key stakeholders on a regular basis.   Facilitating cross-organizational communication.   Managing dependencies   Supporting cross-organizational group needs and expectations (i.e. Testing, Training, Production Deployment Support, Help Desk, Third Party Vendors, Partners)   Owns the release plan.      Requirements    3-5 years digital agency and/or professional services experience.   3-5 years managing software projects with at least 5 resources (preferably in an eCommerce context, inclusive of Creative and UX).   Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills, including polished presentation skills: you will regularly present project status / demo software to all levels client organizations.   Experience with Agile software development methodology (Scrum and/or XP). Experience taking proactive action to improve project velocity and code reliability     RoleTeam Lead/Technical Lead,Industry TypeIT-Software, Software Services,Functional AreaIT Software - eCommerce, Internet Technologies,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryProgramming & DesignEducationUG :Any Graduate in Any SpecializationPG :Post Graduation Not RequiredKey Skillssoftware developmenttestingE-commerceCommerceScope managementStakeholder managementgitPublishingConsultingPackagingScrumagileProject delivery

company: Leading Client
description: Job description Job title : Epicor ERPTechnical Consultant   Reporting to Technical Lead Epicor ERP   - Overall Purpose of the job Develop solutions based on customer requirements.   - Carry out the system analysis and the detailed design process, and ensure that the end product is delivered on time and within budget.   Main duties and responsibilities Carry out solution development which will involve the following :   1. Detailed Design based on the gaps identified between Epicor ERP andthe customer requirements.   2. Prepare and execute Unit Test Cases   3. Develop functionalities which will involve developing new forms, customizing existing forms using Visual Studio c#, Epicor Embedded Toolsand upgrading customizations to newer version.   4. Develop custom reports using Crystal Reports or SSRS.   5. Provide post deployment support to the implementation team until the product is live and transition to support phase.   6. Software Configuration Management and source code control.   7. Produce various statistics and periodic reports as per the company requirements.      Required Candidate profile- Principal qualifications required for job Must possess a Bachelors Degree in Computer Science with major in Software Engineering, or equivalent. - Must have minimum of 3 years of experience in programmingapplication development for ERP systems. - Key competences Must have development and implementation experience in an ERP like Epicor9, SAP, Oracle Financials, or Navision, and have at least worked with Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, Cash Management, General Ledger and Materials Management module. - Candidates with experience in development and implementation in Epicor ERP have added advantage. - Must have development experience in Visual Studio.NET platform and in Microsoft SQL Server 2012 or higher. Should have a development experience using Object Oriented and Service Oriented Architecture. - Must have demonstrable knowledge experience in c# and linq - Must have expert knowledge of UML. - Microsoft Developer Certification is desired upon joining; however the candidate will only be confirmed from probation after completing the required certification. - Must have working knowledge of following Software Requirements Specification standards like ISO 29148:2011. - Must have demonstrable knowledge of web applications using Microsoft .Net platform. - Must have developed reports using reporting tools like SSRS or Crystal Reports. - Must be able to independently create and perform unit test cases. - Be able to effectively use test case management and defects management software. - Must be able to deliver on time and support meeting overall company deadlines. - Must have excellent interpersonal and communication skills. - Must have previously worked in an environment where standard Software Development Methodology like Agile was being followed and has demonstrable knowledge of tools like TFS, version control system and be able to follow set processes within the organization. - Ability to travel abroad for a period of one to three months at a stretch. Candidates who are not working on Microsoft products stack may not apply. description: Job descriptionWhat you do at AMD changes everything   At AMD,  we push the boundaries of what is possible. We believe in changing the world for the better by driving innovation in high-performance computing,  graphics,  and visualization technologies building blocks for gaming,  immersive platforms,  and the data center.   Developing great technology takes more than talent:  it takes amazing people who understand collaboration,  respect,  and who will go the extra mile to achieve unthinkable results. It takes people who have the passion and desire to disrupt the status quo,  push boundaries,  deliver innovation,  and change the world. If you have this type of passion,  we invite you to take a look at the opportunities available to come join our team. Work closely with multiple design teams at AMD to develop and support design flows,  EDA software applications,  and scripts for Logic Equivalence Verification,  Low Power Design checks,  and RTL Analysis. Communicate effectively with RTL and Circuit Design Engineers to define requirements and resolve issues. A suitable candidate would have knowledge in RTL Design using Verilog and SystemVerilog,  Gate Level Design,  and Formal Verification Strategies with tools and platforms such as Synopsys Formality,  Cadence Conformal LEC,  Synopsys VC-LP,  Verific,  Spyglass,  and/ or other like tools. Software Development knowledge with scripting languages such as Perl and TCL is also a requirement. company: Innovium was founded with a focus on developing and deploying advanced technology that successfully addresses the most challenging issues facing data centers. As a technology driven company, we pride ourselves on creating leading-edge innovation that aims to shatter generally accepted limits, delivering breakthrough results for our customers. We are a talented, diverse, fun-loving and synergistic team that has a proven track record of success. Each one of us has the passion for excellence, determination to succeed and skills to provide sustainable value in the areas we are addressing.
description: Job description   What You ll Do    Innovium Inc is looking to hire an engineer with at least 5 years of experience that is interested in developing game-changing, disruptive products for the data-center infrastructure. Successful candidates must have a strong passion for the latest technologies and strong problem solving and troubleshooting skills.    Who You ll Work With    You ll work closely with your peers on a team of skilled engineers working to meet our organizational goals.    Who You Are     You have a bachelor s degree in computer or electrical engineering.     You have at least 5 years of experience with ASIC verification, using modern verification methodologies encompassing: constrained random and assertion/coverage-based environments.     You have experience with end-to-end verification cycle on a complex block/sub-system from Testplan to coverage closure.     You have hands on coding experience in System Verilog or other object oriented language.     You have experience with scripting in Perl/Python/Shell.     You are highly motivated and skillful at solving difficult technical problems.     It would be a big plus if     You had a master s degree in computer or electrical engineering.     You have experience in networking, storage and/or SOC.     You have experience in C/C++ programming. description: Job description   What You ll Do    Innovium Inc is looking to hire an engineer with at least 5 years of experience that is interested in developing game-changing, disruptive products for the data-center infrastructure. Successful candidates must have a strong passion for the latest technologies and strong problem solving and troubleshooting skills.    Who You ll Work With    You ll work closely with your peers on a team of skilled engineers working to meet our organizational goals.    Who You Are     You have a bachelor s degree in computer or electrical engineering.     You have at least 5 years of Silicon Validation/Emulation experience with excellent debugging skills.     You have at least 2 years of experience with ASIC verification, using modern verification methodologies encompassing: constrained random and assertion/coverage-based environments.     You are highly motivated and skillful at solving difficult technical problems.     You have expertise in silicon bring up.     You have expertise with scripting in Perl/Python/Shell.     You are an expert in C/C++ programming.     It would be a big plus if     You had a master s degree in computer or electrical engineering.     You have experience in networking, storage and/or SOC.     You have knowledge of PCIe protocol. description: Job description   Senior  Oracle Fusion Middleware Administrator       Job Description:     Location - Hyderabad, India      Brief  Description:    The Oracle Fusion Middleware Administrator  has to manage the SOA/BPEL applications and ADF Applications which are  integrated to EBS. The Fusion Middleware Administrator has to work closely with  Oracle Database DBA and together support Production SOA Systems. The Fusion  Middleware Administrator has to work with Developers and help them resolving  the day to day issues and Deploy code to PROD and Non Prod instances.           Job  Duties:       Installation, configuration of  Oracle Fusion Middleware products like, WebLogic, SOA/BPEL, OHS and ADF     Work with on-site team and  Collaborate.    Work with developers and users  to migrate code between non-production Weblogic instances.     Refresh of non-production SOA  instances from Production instance.    Troubleshoot and help resolve  SOA/BPEL issues.    Installation, configuration and  administration of WebLogic infrastructure.    Patching and Upgrade of  WebLogic infrastructure.    Excellent experience in  troubleshooting.    Good knowledge of  configuration, installation and support of BIP/OBIEE reporting tools.    Apply patches to the Fusion  Middleware applications.     Manage Oracle Fusion Middleware  Instances integration to EBS.    Manage routine Application  backup procedures and disaster recovery procedures.     Provide On-Call support to  Production Systems.     Competent to work at the  highest level of all phases of SOA/Weblogic administration.            Qualifications:      Knowledge:       Good Communications Skills and  should be able to communicate with Client and On-site team.     Must have extensive knowledge  of Oracle Fusion Middleware Products like WebLogic, SOA/BPEL, OHS and ADF.    Must have extensive knowledge  of Oracle RDBMS.     Must have extensive knowledge  of Oracle Fusion Middleware Products in a LINUX environment.    UNIX/LINUX scripting knowledge  is required.    Thorough knowledge of SQL  including PL/SQL.    Willing to learn and support  other related applications to SOA/BPEL.              Experience:         Bachelor's Degree preferred.  Suitable experience will substitute.     7 years of overall experience  in information systems is required with 5 years of Managing Oracle Fusion  Middleware Products working as a Weblogic/SOA Admin.    2-4 Years of experience working  in Oracle Fusion Middleware technologies.     2-4 years of experience in  Devops    2-4 years of work experience in  tomcat/apache    Knowledge of OBIEE and other BI  tools is preferred. description: Job description     You will design, install, configure, implement, and maintain different types of data networks, voice, and video infrastructure in an enterprise environment    You will troubleshoot data networks, voice, and video infrastructure complex problems and outages across a broad range of technologies   You will get to maximize networks, voice, and video infrastructure performance; tune performance parameters by analyzing monitoring and trend analysis reports   You will secure networks, voice, and video infrastructure systems by establishing and enforcing policies and by defining and monitoring access   You will schedule and perform upgrades to keep networks, voice, and video infrastructure technology up to date   You will use your collaboration ability to work with different IT stake holders within the organization, and with external customers, to ensure that networks, voice, and video infrastructure support the needs of the organization and customers   You will debug system-level problems in hardware and software in multi-vendor, multi-protocol data networks as well as in voice, and video infrastructure environment   You will simulate data networks, voice, and video infrastructure incidents in LAB to identify root causes; manage data networks, voice, and video infrastructure escalations from internal teams; and administrate and maintain data networks as well as voice and video infrastructure-based environment or any network-related issues per the requirement.   You will Administrate and manage Cisco Switches, Routers, and Firewall management   You will provide remote infrastructure support and VPN configuration.   You will find quick solutions to malfunctions while making sure that the designated network equipment and computers stay functional        Minimum 2 years (up to 9 years) of experience in various data networks and in voice and video infrastructure tools and technologies   Experience and knowledge with Layer 2 & 3 internetworking technologies, Polycom MGC/RMX consoles, VSX/HDX VC systems, display units, Matrix switchers, and Crestron controls   Experience and knowledge with TCP/IP, routing protocols, Netflow, access-control lists, firewalls, DNS, VPN, IPSEC, AAA, and TACACS   Experience and knowledge with Wireless controllers, ACS, Load Balancers, all switches, routers, and firewalls   Nortel AVAYA systems: Working knowledge of Legacy and IP-enabled PBX systems (CS1000M, Call Pilot, and Symposium)   Bachelor degree in engineering or equivalent   Cisco, Avaya, Polycom certification, CCNA, and CCNP preferred          Why you will love this job:      You are great at managing networks. We have vast networks as a large technology company that specializes in the communications industry. See where we are going with this?we need someone really good. What are you waiting for? This job is for you!   You will be a key member of a global, dynamic and highly collaborative team with various possibilities for personal and professional development   You will have the opportunity to work in multinational environment for the global market leader in its field    RoleNetwork Administrator,Industry TypeIT-Software, Software Services,Functional AreaIT Software - Network Administration, Security,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryAdmin/Maintenance/Security/DatawarehousingEducationUG :B.Tech/B.E. in Electronics/TelecommunicationPG :Post Graduation Not RequiredKey SkillsWirelessNortelVPNTrend analysisDNSInfrastructureCCNAciscoAmdocsMonitoring

description: Job descriptionSeptember 23,  2017 RJC307 | Senior Network Engineer-L3 Rectras RJC307 | Senior Network Engineer-L3 RJC307 | Senior Network Engineer-L3  For leading Product Development Company    The purpose of this role is to provide data communications support to the business units with regards to all the data needs.   This includes,  but is not limited to:     Support of hosted environments in the Web DMZ (includes internet links,  BGP peering and load-balancing). Layer 2 switching configuration and support in all sites (approx. 110 Cities). Layer 3 routing configuration and support in all sites (approx. 110 Cities). Assist with WAN and LAN trouble shooting should it be required. Work with outsourced WAN management providers to diagnose and resolve issues. Create knowledge base articles for the internal support staff. Using internal ticketing system to update and resolve tickets assigned to the Comms team (incidents,  problems,  tasks). Troubleshoot Cisco wireless infrastructure if faults or performance issues reported. Assist with site and project rollouts.    High-Level Tasks:     Provide technically competent and suitable solutions to assigned incidents. Work with 3rd party vendors and service providers to determine the cause of issues (where appropriate). Provide data and voice communications support,  configuration,  installation,  cancellation and maintenance services to the business. Review and audit communications equipment,  services,  cabling and capacities. Manage solutions delivery in accordance controls. Contribute to the maintenance of the data and voice communications systems. Recommend communication systems modifications/  improvements to the Communications Manager. Contribute to data and voice communication projects. Identify and escalate communication project risks the Communications Manager. SAS analyst with responsibilities for writing model implementation code,  maintaining and analyzing data.  You will be the first and the closest point of contact with clients' data and have an opportunity for coming up with ideas for new projects and products

Depending upon your qualifications,  this role could also include the functions of: 

Programmer writing near-generic decision engines which would be fine-tuned to suit specific customer environments.  You would also be creating CBTs for the company's training requirements.  You would be using C/ C++/ Java/ HTML 

Systems Administrator maintaining a mix of Linux/ Unix servers (Email,  Firewall,  Proxy,  Data/ SAS) and Windows clients.  You would also be involved in ensuring that Modelytics keeps up with Information Security requirements. 

Career Path 

We encourage individuals to broaden their knowledge and skills,  and not just within their departments.  Not only would you have the opportunity to grow into all of the above areas to develop into a truly adept IT manager,  but you could also move to the Modeling or the Marketing & Client Development function.  

Opportunities for Learning 

You will gain a thorough understanding of client industries and businesses.  Being in a client and vendor facing role,  you would get a chance to interact with diverse groups of people building your knowledge and communication skills in the process.  You will be exposed to cutting edge tools and techniques.  Our culture facilitates your participation in tasks and projects relating to other functional areas as well,  opening up other,  promising avenues for your learning. company:
Company Description 

About Eurofins 

Eurofins Scientific is an international life sciences company, providing a unique range of analytical testing services to clients across multiple industries, to make life and our environment safer, healthier and more sustainable. From the food you eat, to the water you drink, to the medicines you rely on, Eurofins works with the biggest companies in the world to ensure the products they supply are safe, their ingredients are authentic and labelling is accurate. Eurofins believes it is a global leader in food, environmental, pharmaceutical and cosmetics products testing and in agroscience CRO services. It is also one of the global independent market leaders in certain testing and laboratory services for genomics, discovery pharmacology, forensics, CDMO, advanced material sciences and in the support of clinical studies.

In over just 30 years, Eurofins has grown from one laboratory in Nantes, France to over 47,000 staff across a network of more than 900 independent companies in over 50 countries and operating more than 800 laboratories. Eurofins offers a portfolio of over 200,000 analytical methods to evaluate the safety, identity, composition, authenticity, origin, traceability and purity of biological substances and products, as well as providing innovative clinical diagnostic testing services, as one of the leading global emerging players in specialised clinical diagnostics testing.

In 2019, Eurofins generated total revenues of EUR 4.56 billion, and has been among the best performing stocks in Europe over the past 20 years.

About Eurofins IT Solutions India Pvt Ltd 

Eurofins IT Solutions India Pvt Ltd (A CMMI Level 3 Company) is a 100% full owned subsidiary of Eurofins. This young captive centre located in Bangalore was established in 2012 to be the largest IT Solutions group within Eurofins to cater to all the internal IT business needs. The primary focus of IT Solution group will be to develop the next generation LIMS (Lab Information Management system), Customer portals, Ecommerce solutions, ERP/CRM system & B2B platforms for various Eurofins Laboratories and businesses.

EITS India is a Young, Dynamic and Growing organization with lot of career growth prospects. We strongly believe that Our people are our assets and we ensure that all our staff are provided with great work environment, good benefits and challenging Global projects to enable a fulfilling career. We are committed to provide enriching experience to our employees.
description: Job descriptionJob Description      POSITION TITLE : QA Test Engineer    REPORTING LOCATION: Bangalore    WORKING LOCATION: Bangalore     SUMMARY OF POSITION AND OBJECTIVES:     Smart test engineer required    to work as a scrum team member in testing role with manual testing skills and to deliver high quality product. Should be willing to scale up in Automation skills up on training.     POSITION & OBJECTIVES   : Test Engineer as part of the defined scrum team should have the ability to test software early in the cycle and identify defects, by means of manual testing . Also appreciate to have the ability to learn automation skills as a long term objective. This role expects the candidate to work closely with the scrum team effectively, understand the requirements and think through all possible use cases to test and produce outcome that results in improving the quality of the product.     REQUIRED EXPERIENCE AND SKILLS:       Experience:      Mandatory experience in manual testing    Understand the requirements and write test cases and perform manual testing on the application.    Perform the review of the Test Cases from other team members.    Provide effective communication regarding issues, objectives, initiatives and performance to plan    Should have good knowledge of Defect Management process and be able to perform Root Cause Analysis of Defects.      Technology skills:       Mandatory     Strong experience in manual testing    Strong understanding of SQA methodologies    Experience in testing web services like SOAP, Rest. company:
Company Description 

About Eurofins 

Eurofins Scientific is an international life sciences company, providing a unique range of analytical testing services to clients across multiple industries, to make life and our environment safer, healthier and more sustainable. From the food you eat, to the water you drink, to the medicines you rely on, Eurofins works with the biggest companies in the world to ensure the products they supply are safe, their ingredients are authentic and labelling is accurate. Eurofins believes it is a global leader in food, environmental, pharmaceutical and cosmetics products testing and in agroscience CRO services. It is also one of the global independent market leaders in certain testing and laboratory services for genomics, discovery pharmacology, forensics, CDMO, advanced material sciences and in the support of clinical studies.

In over just 30 years, Eurofins has grown from one laboratory in Nantes, France to over 47,000 staff across a network of more than 900 independent companies in over 50 countries and operating more than 800 laboratories. Eurofins offers a portfolio of over 200,000 analytical methods to evaluate the safety, identity, composition, authenticity, origin, traceability and purity of biological substances and products, as well as providing innovative clinical diagnostic testing services, as one of the leading global emerging players in specialised clinical diagnostics testing.

In 2019, Eurofins generated total revenues of EUR 4.56 billion, and has been among the best performing stocks in Europe over the past 20 years.

About Eurofins IT Solutions India Pvt Ltd 

Eurofins IT Solutions India Pvt Ltd (A CMMI Level 3 Company) is a 100% full owned subsidiary of Eurofins. This young captive centre located in Bangalore was established in 2012 to be the largest IT Solutions group within Eurofins to cater to all the internal IT business needs. The primary focus of IT Solution group will be to develop the next generation LIMS (Lab Information Management system), Customer portals, Ecommerce solutions, ERP/CRM system & B2B platforms for various Eurofins Laboratories and businesses.

EITS India is a Young, Dynamic and Growing organization with lot of career growth prospects. We strongly believe that Our people are our assets and we ensure that all our staff are provided with great work environment, good benefits and challenging Global projects to enable a fulfilling career. We are committed to provide enriching experience to our employees.
description: Job descriptionJob Description      POSITION TITLE: QA TEST ENGINEER    REPORTING TO: QA MANAGER    REPORTING LOCATION: BANGALORE    WORKING LOCATION: BANGALORE    SUMMARY OF POSITION AND OBJECTIVES:     Test Engineer with smart and good analysis skill is required to work as a team member in testing role with manual and automated testing skills to deliver high quality product.    POSITION & OBJECTIVES  : QA Test Engineer with ability to test software early in the cycle and identify defects, also having ability to write automated code to test the functionality on a long run. This role needs the team member to work along with team, understand the requirements and think through all possible use cases for Integration between few applications to test and automate the particular functionality with best quality.    REQUIRED EXPERIENCE AND SKILLS:     Experience:    Very good at manual testing of web and windows based applications, web services testing and integration testing of a complex system.   Good in SQL to write medium complex join queries to validate the data in the Database.   Good understanding of JSON, XML, REST, SOAP, etc.   Understand the requirements and transform those into Test Cases and ET Charters.   Collaboratively work with different stakeholders like FA, Dev, QA, Project Manager, etc.   Perform various types of testing like sanity, functional, exploratory, integration and system testing to ensure that the product delivered is of high quality.   Support the automation of API s along with Automation Engineers.   Follow the organization defined processes and ensure that all required documentation are created and maintained.   Provide effective communication regarding issues, objectives, initiatives and share regular status reports with all stake holders.   Escalate and follow - up in a timely manner about all blocking issues and any deviations from SOP s.   Support the Planning of test schedules in accordance with project scope/delivery dates and ensure that the timelines are adhered to without fail.   Participate in user story reviews to provide input on functional requirements, Acceptance Criteria, schedules, or potential problems.   Have very good knowledge on SDLC and STLC lifecycles and working knowledge in agile.    Technical Knowledge:    Strong understanding of software testing methodologies.   Experience in testing web services like SOAP, REST.   Hands - on experience in Services testing tools like Fiddler, Postman, JSON Lint.   Experience in using CI tools like TFS, SVN, etc.   Experience in test management tools like TFS, MTM, ALM, etc.   Strong in Database and SQL skills.   Exposure to Agile / Scrum methodologies.   Prior experience of testing LIMS would be an added advantage.   C# programming skillset is good to have    Personal Qualities:    Excellent analytical and problem solving skills.   Excellent verbal and written communication skills.   Very good team player abilities.   Proven ability to effectively share knowledge and stay aware of current trends and technical advancements.   Ability to work in large distributed local and international teams.   At ease with remote communications leveraging a wide array of technologies (like, shared code, documents and forums, phone, chat, email, etc.).    Preferred:    BE/MCA or any other equivalent degree   Experience between 2 to 4 years.   Candidates with ISTQB certification will have better preference   Candidates with LIMS domain knowledge will have better preference  Qualifications      BE/MCA or any other equivalent degree  RoleTesting Engineer,Industry TypeIT-Software, Software Services,Functional AreaIT Software - QA & Testing,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryProgramming & DesignEducationUG :Any Graduate in Any SpecializationPG :MCA in ComputersKey SkillsSystem testingAutomationManual testingTesting toolsXMLJSONWindowsTest casesSDLCSQL

description: Job description  - We are looking forward to meet people whose professional experience and skills can be channeled into an exciting and growing industry. Talented, energetic, committed and self-motivated individuals with a penchant for working within teams can look forward to an exciting career with attractive growth opportunities. Competitive salary, flexible work schedules, employee achievement awards and growth plan will let you plan a secure and fulfilling career at Angara.     About the Role :     - We are looking for a Quality Assurance Engineer to develop and execute exploratory, regression & functional tests as well as automated tests in order to ensure product quality. As a QA Engineer, you will estimate, plan, and coordinate testing activities.   - You will also ensure that quality issues and defects are appropriately identified, documented, tracked, and resolved in our defect tracking system. description:
Job descriptionDell provides the technology that transforms the way we all work and live. But we are more than a technology company we are a people company. We inspire, challenge and respect every one of our over 100,000 employees. We also provide them with unparalleled growth and development opportunities.

The Software Engineering team delivers next-generation software application enhancements and new products for a changing world. Working at the cutting edge, we design and develop software for platforms, peripherals, applications and diagnostics all with the most advanced technologies, tools, software engineering methodologies and the collaboration of internal and external partners.



Why Work For Us:

Dell is primed to recruit the best and brightest candidates from all across the globe. We take pride in fostering a winning, innovative, inclusive employee culture. We also take calculated risks and we celebrate big victories when they pay off.



About Business unit:

Dell EMC PowerMax systems are enterprise-class storage platforms intended for open systems and mainframe computing. The PowerMax family is the first Dell EMC hardware platform with storage back-end that uses Non-Volatile Memory Express ( NVMe ) for customer data. The NVMe-based PowerMax was specifically created to fully unlock the bandwidth, IOPS, and latency performance benefits that NVM Media offers to host based applications which are unattainable using the current generation of all flash storage arrays. The PowerMax opens the door for customers to deploy innovative applications in the areas of real-time analytics, machine learning and big data that demand lower latency and higher performance. PowerMax systems enables 24x7xForever application availability. The PowerMax is architected to provide six nines ( 99.9999%) of availability in the most demanding, missing critical environments. PowerMax Dynamic Virtual Matrix architecture incorporates lessons learned from more than 20 years of expertise in designing, implementing and perfecting enterprise-class intelligent data protection solutions.



Key Responsibilities 

Design and develop new features and applications for enterprise-level customer environments

Develop Proof of Concepts

Provide support for existing product

Essential Requirements 

BE or Master s Degree in Computer Science or related field

5+ years of relevant experience.

Experience in Storage domain and working with Linux Operating System

Strong in Operating System concepts, Networking concepts, Data Structures and system programming

Experience with C/C++, Java Server side technologies

Very good problem solving and analytical skills

Experience in Element Management Systems in Storage domain is plusRoleSoftware Developer,Industry TypeIT-Software, Software Services,Functional AreaIT Software - System Programming,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryProgramming & DesignEducationUG :B.Tech/B.E. in ComputersPG :M.Tech in ComputersKey SkillsComputer scienceC++LinuxNetworkingHP data protectorSystem programmingMachine learningData structuresEMCAnalytics

company: DXC.technology  DXC is  the world€™s leading independent, end- to-end IT services company,  helping clients  harness the power of innovation to thrive on change.   Created by the merger of CSC and the Enterprise Services   business of Hewlett Packard Enterprise, DXC Technology   is a $25 billion company with a 60-year legacy of delivering results   for thousands of clients in more than 70 countries. Our technology   independence, global talent and extensive partner  network    combine to deliver powerful next-generation IT services and  solutions.  As the world€™s leading  independent,  end-to- end IT services company, we are uniquely  positioned to lead digital transformations , creating  greater value for clients, partners and shareholders, and  presenting growth opportunities for our people. We are among the  world€™s best corporate citizens.We have 155,000 employees  in more than 70 countries, serving some 6,000 clients. We tap  into global talent, powerful next-generation IT solutions and  extensive partner relationships to help clients transform digitally  and seize opportunities.Our extensive partner network  helps us drive collaboration and leverage technology independence.  We have established more than 250 industry-leading global Partner  Network relationships, including 15 strategic partners: Amazon  Web Services, AT&T, Dell EMC, HCL, Hitachi, HPE, HP, IBM,  Lenovo, Micro Focus, Microsoft, Oracle, PwC, SAP and Service Now.Specialties Application  Services, Banking, Big Data,  Business Services, Cloud Services,  Healthcare, Cybersecurity,  Insurance, Mobility and IoT, Life Sciences,  Manufacturing, Retail,  and Travel and Transportation. DXC provides information technology and  consulting services to businesses and governments. The company  operates in more than 70 countries and trades on the New York  Stock Exchange and is a  component of the S&P 500 index.DXC India is ramping up its headcount  across its offices in India (Chennai,Hyderabad,  Noida, Bangaluru,    Indore and Mumbai ). Currently we are looking for professionals   with following skill sets  to join our Global Team.

•Responsible for the Aircraft component Maintenance Software setup within the organization.

Other skills 

•Must be well versed with Hardware and software systems

•Team management skills.

Education qualification 

•Graduate in IT /  Computer manager

Work Experience 

•Minimum 3 years post qualification experience,  preferably in Aviation Sector

description: Job description Responsible for creating and maintaining infrastructure necessary for the growth and the upkeep of field and Network operations which shall include Internet Data Centers, ATM sites, Cable Landing Stations and NW space to drive network efficiency and availability. Drive the procurement and technical planning of TGN and submarine cables owned by consortiums/TCL and effect cost savings. Corrects mission critical utility infrastructure problems effectively at optimal costs and in a timely manner. Ensuring necessary co-ordination on certification and field level testing, as appropriate for the business segment. Coordination with the Technical teams for new enhancements/issue resolution. Drives initiatives, industrialization, and efficiencies to facilities for improvements (i.e. enhancements, updates, upgrades, new systems).    Establishes tools and procedures to monitor field operations performance. Ensure reliability and robustness of the cable systems. Set up configurations - number of fibre pairs in the cable, capacity, landing stations. Manage the complete capacity distribution and traffic activation on the cable system. Provide manpower technical resource support for internal customers during Project Implementation and Delivery. Maintains critical power and environment quality standards to achieve optimal levels of operation. Tracks and monitors the environment performance to ensure minimal interruption to network transmission and/or network switches. Ensuring compliance with all regulatory stipulations within the region. Represent interests of TCL in the cable consortiums (IMEWE, SEAMEWE etc.)To lead, drive and monitor all maintenance and cost savings activities related to facilities including facility maintenance and thereby ensuring sufficient focus on optimizing cost of facility infrastructure while maintaining reliability, both in terms of operations and capital investments. Some roles within this group may manage marine cables and network equipment maintenance, international real estate management, security operations for all sites and Network ensuring adequate support for maintenance of international facilities and network at optimal costs, ensuring sufficient focus on optimizing cost of facility infrastructure while maintaining reliability , both in terms of operations and capital investments. May also supervise technical and administrative staff.Work-group/team focus. company: Innovis Telecom Services Pvt Ltd
description:
Job description

JD Details-: Role: Drive Test Engineer 

Job Description:

- Drive test of the assigned Network area using Drive Test tools and collect logs including checking the in-building coverage both for voice and data( 2G/ 3G/ LTE ) as per Test plan.

- Bench mark drive test the assigned Network area both for Voice and data ( 2G/ 3G/ LTE) as per plan on 247 basis.

- Drive test of the assigned area of the Network as per customer complaints and also during the visit of VVIP in the assigned area as per instruction of the Team lead on 247 basis.

- Carry out physical optimisation of the Site based on drive test log and also at the instruction of the Optimisation team.

- Analysis of Drive test log to find out the gap in Network quality.

- Report the progress of assigned drive test activities and customer complaint case. 

- Prepare presentations with prediction plot and participate in technical discussions with customer.

- Co-ordinate with FLM team to improve the network coverage related Antenna orientation/ Tilt.

- Carry out Site Survey for RF requirement.

- Manage the company assets like DT tools, Laptops, GPS, Inverter.

- Basic Skill Requirement :

- Good knowledge on RF fundamentals.

- Basic knowledge on GSM ,WCDMA, LTE technology, Antenna Theory.

- Ability to use tools like TEMS/  NEMO Drive Test Tool, Map info.

- Ability to use post processing tools like Actix and NEMO Analyser.

- Understand the basic RF parameters/ KPI of the GSM/  WCDMA/ LTE Network.

- Basic understanding of RF planning and Optimisation Techniques.

- IT skill in MS office like words, excel and power point.

Job Experience :

Must have 2-3years experience in RF Survey/  DT etc.

Academic Qualification: Graduate in Engineering or Diploma in Engineering in Electronics/  Telecommunication.

General Requirement :

1. Must be holding a valid passport.

2. Must be willing to travel for long periods stretching 6 months.

3. "Positive attitude in handling customer"RoleRF Engineer,Industry TypeSemiconductors, Electronics,Functional AreaIT Hardware, Technical Support, Telecom Engineering,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryTelecomEducationUG :Diploma in Mechanical, Any Graduate in Any SpecializationPG :Post Graduation Not RequiredKey SkillsGSMTelecomActix3GDrive test toolTelecommunicationRF planningTest planningCustomer complaintsMS Office

company: EGIS India Consulting Engineers Pvt. Ltd.
description:
Job descriptionEntity description

Egis in India is an integrated infrastructure company that offers the dual advantage of French expertise & experience in integrated infrastructure development in over 100 countries coupled with around two decades of knowledge & understanding of the Indian markets. This makes Egis best suited to offer end- to- end infrastructure solutions for a global India. Egis has been present in India since 1994,   providing state- of- the- art infrastructure solutions for more than two decades.

The range of services offered by Egis in India includes planning,   feasibility studies,   detailed engineering,   procurement assistance,   construction supervision and overall program management as well as operation & maintenance (for roads & airports) in the following sectors:

Roads and Highways Water and Environment Rail Urban Development Aviation Building Engineering GIS & Data Mining Ports 

Candidate criteria

Minimum educational 

BE/ B.Tech. (Electrical,   Electronic & Communication or Equivalent) with min 8 + years of Exp

Description of the position

Detailed description of the position

Will be Responsible for planning,   design approvals,   managing systems interface,   installation testing and commissioning of complete Signalling & Train control systems ( Ixl,   ATP,   ATO,   ATS etc.) Review and finalization of Signalling tenders and Estimates metro Project. Responsible for review and finalization of Signalling & designs non- interlocking and interlocking area in all depots submitted by contractors. Review Project management plan,   Interface Management plan,   Work plan,   Quality Assurance,   System Assurance (RAMS) plan,   Design Management plan,   Inspection Installation Test and Commissioning plan,   Training plan,   Preliminary Maintenance Plan. Responsible for Approving of Factory acceptance plans and carrying out FATs of tests of Signalling Material Issuing of acceptance certificates. Responsible for Coordination with Civil,   E&M,   Architect,   Track,   Rolling stock & PST departments for addressing various Interfacing issues. Responsible for Compiling of Signalling system documents and coordinate for their approval  Automatic Train Protection system (ATP) designs in coordination with Rolling stock Responsible for review of Automatic Train Operation system (ATO) and Train Protection system (ATP) designs in coordination with Rolling stock & Telecom. Responsible for planning,   design approvals,   managing systems interface,   installation testing and commissioning of all Telecom systems mainly CCTV,   VTS,   BTN,   Radio,   Telephone,   Clock etc.

company: Trignotek Systems Private Limited was founded to be one of the leading service providers of installation, commissioning and maintenance solutions for companies involved in the communications infrastructure market. The company supplies major OEMs, Network and Mobile operators and equipment vendors with a complete range of resource and telecoms turnkey solutions, including building maintenance and facilities management. Working in partnership with leading industry names to deliver a full range of technical solutions, to the highest quality standards required by the industry. New technologies mean new and evolving requirements and challenges. Trignotek Systems Private Limited work with our clients to innovate new ways of project delivery and performing value-added services for our customers. Our unique selling propositions stand for something specific, and it becomes what we are known for. Our personalized service packages for customers leverage no hard and fast rules which are well accepted. Trignotek Systems Private Limited's services range from network inspection to vendor management understanding very well that a well-maintained network will require less corrective maintenance and will be easier and more reliable to operate. At Trignotek Systems Private Limited, we believe consulting is all about finding ways to make business more effective and efficient - about giving a source of competitive advantage. Trignotek Systems Private Limited focus on business needs of our customer and provide solutions based on industry specific innovative solutions.

company: Maersk Group is a worldwide organization with about 76.000 employees and offices in around 130 countries. In addition to owning one of the world's largest shipping companies, Maersk is also involved in a wide range of activities within the energy, shipping and manufacturing industries. In 2018, Maersk Group was no. 305 in the Fortune Global 500 listing.At Maersk we value the diversity of our talent and will always strive to recruit the best person for the job - we value diversity in all its forms, including but not limited to: gender, age, nationality, race, sexual orientation, disability or religious beliefs. We are proud of our diversity and see it as a genuine source of strength for building high performing teams.Maersk Legal Shared Services provides legal, claims and compliance services to a diverse range of functions across the Maersk Group. The successful candidate will be joining a large team of in-house lawyers, insurance and claims specialists, compliance officers and other experts focused on meeting customer needs whilst mitigating risk across the business. The team operates in a matrix organization, interacting with senior stakeholders from Copenhagen, The Hague and around the world on a daily basis providing legal advice and guidance to the business.
description: Job descriptionWe are looking to hire     Associate Legal Counsel for our Legal Team in Mumbai location    Maersk Legal Shared Services provides legal, claims and compliance services to a diverse range of functions across the Maersk Group. The successful candidate will be joining a large team of in-house lawyers, claims specialists, compliance officers and other experts focused on meeting customer needs whilst mitigating risk across the business. The team operates in a matrix organization, interacting with senior stakeholders from Copenhagen, The Hague and around the world on a daily basis whilst providing important advice and guidance to the business.     We Offer -   When you join Maersk, you'll find that the world is your workplace. You'll work in a culturally diverse, stimulating environment, surrounded by new ideas and different ways of doing things. We believe in individual performance within highly professional teams supported by our distinctive values. To us teamwork means acceptance, respect, dedication and the idea that we can achieve more when we all pull together.     Living our values means competing in the market place in an ethical way so our name is synonymous with being a credible and valuable business partner. Through Constant Care and Humbleness, we strive to prepare for the future, while never forgetting that our customers and competitors are key to our ability to improve. In our daily work Uprightness and Our Employees mean that transparency and accountability in everything we do go hand in hand with being an inspiring, challenging place to work. At Maersk, we take pride in hiring the best person for the job - irrespective of gender, age, nationality or religious belief.             Key Responsibilities -  The Associate Legal Counsel, Data Privacy will provide day-to-day advice to the business and support our Copenhagen team on a wide range of projects and initiatives around data privacy compliance, including:  Reviewing contracts Acting as the point of contact for, and consulting with, stakeholders on matters related to processing of personal data; Drafting and maintaining of data privacy global notices and different global data privacy policies to cover the collection and further processing of personal data; Supporting and monitoring of compliance with the global data privacy policies, other relevant data privacy provisions and appropriate global internal data privacy policies and procedures; Support the personal data mapping processes and monitor their performance; Drafting and negotiation of contractual data privacy clauses in different type of agreements; Organize meetings, internal trainings and maintain minutes of the meetings; Support in defining the means of processing when working jointly with other controllers or with processors; Support the efforts of drafting and updating data privacy related frameworks and other documentations; Support efforts of drafting and updating contractual templates; Support efforts of drafting and updating data privacy related compliance templates (i.e. consent forms, privacy notices, etc.)            We are looking for -  The ideal candidate holds a Bachelor of Law. Master of Law a plus. The candidate has 3-5 years of experience from an in-house function in an internationally oriented law firm or international corporation with an experience in single headedly dealing (drafting, reviewing and finalizing) with agreements. Experience of working in data privacy or related compliance experience preferred Understanding of international commercial law and Data Privacy/Tech law is preferred. Familiarity with EU GDPR legislation Given high stakeholder interaction excellent English skills both oral as well as written are required and proven capability in MS Office is expected Ability to take a strategic approach Good communication and analytical skills  Female candidates preferred        Interested applicants - request you to kindly  contact us on - rajeshwari.bhadange1@maersk.com         RoleLegal Manager,Industry TypeShipping, Marine,Functional AreaLegal, Regulatory, Intellectual Property,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryOtherEducationUG :LLB in LawPG :LLM in LawDoctorate :Any Doctorate in Any SpecializationKey SkillsGlobal Data PrivacyInternal Data PoliciesContract Draftingcontract reviewdata protectiongdpr legislationdata privacyLawyerInternational Commercial Lawcommunication skillsStakeholder Management

description: Job descriptionJOB PURPOSE:To provide legal support to the Avery Dennison RBIS business in South Asia (India, Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and Pakistan) and effectively manage assigned legal matters for the Company under the supervision of the Supervising Attorney. To perform such other duties as may be assigned by the Supervising Attorney from time to time.Location: Bangalore, IndiaReporting relationship: Reports to the Legal Counsel, South Asia.Responsibilities: Provide high quality legal service in a wide range of areas including: commercial contracts, corporate, regulatory compliance, labor/employment, real estate, import/export matters, and legal matters associated with business transactions and restructurings; Drafting and reviewing agreements including distribution, sales, procurement, lease, agency, and information technology agreements; Managing employment and labor-related claims, including union  issues; Litigation services include advice and strategy regarding potential and pending litigation, selecting and managing outside counsel and the course of the litigation, and resolving litigation through trial or settlements via outside counsel; Coordinating and being responsible for company secretarial work in conjunction with the secretaries; Have regular interaction with business clients to understand objectives, goals and strategies to gain knowledge for providing business-oriented legal advice; Able to plan and carry-out complex and sensitive internal investigations; Strong ability to train non-lawyers about the law and how to comply with laws and policies; Collaborate with other law department members to ensure effective and efficient delivery of legal services; Continually review legal literature to stay abreast of developments in Indian law (e.g., state and national statutes and regulations, court decisions, agency actions, etc.) relevant to current or future Company operations and alert the Supervising Attorney when necessary. Our sustainability efforts focus on Environmental Protection as well as Social Responsibility to help develop the communities we operate in.P&G operates under three entities in India  -  two listed entities ????Procter & Gamble Hygiene and Health Care Limited???? and ????Gillette India Limited????, as well as one 100% subsidiary of the parent company in the U.S. called ????Procter & Gamble Home Products????
description: Job description               Description    P&G was founded over 180 years ago as a simple soap and candle company. Today, we're the world s largest consumer goods company and home to iconic, trusted brands that make life a little bit easier in small but meaningful ways. We've spanned three centuries thanks to three simple ideas: leadership, innovation and citizenship.    The insight, innovation and passion of hardworking teams has helped us grow into a global company that is governed responsibly and ethically, that is open and transparent, and that supports good causes and protects the environment. This is a place where you can be proud to work and do something that matters    Global Brand Protection is the function which protects our business from counterfeit products. The function has a regional brand protection manager in each key P&G region supported by a global Centre of Excellence from other key fields such as forensics, intelligence and packaging development. In this role, you will be the single point of contact responsible for leading and promoting anti - counterfeiting work in the Region and working with the E - IMEA Operations Group Brand Protection leader and Center of Excellence to implement our key brand protection strategies:     You will work to assess counterfeit threats.    Educate and update regional business and marketing leaders on counterfeit issues.    Locate, recruit, manage and train third party investigators in each country to assist with investigations    Ensuring our standard FCPA contract is in place and our company s PVPs and compliance laws are followed.    Manage and provide oversight on all advised investigative efforts to ensure the quality, validity, and appropriate scope of the investigation.    Develop effective relationships with customs and law enforcement    Report all results and intelligence on a regular basis within brand protection databases    Work with sales to enable direct coverage of genuine products following raids and seizures    Meticulously plan and manage the budget, ensuring that fiscal responsibility is practiced and demonstrated in line with expectations and within purchasing guidelines.    Fully understand and uniformly the brand protection standards, practices, and CBAs contained within the SOP (Standard Operating Procedures).      Qualifications    Requirements (skills experiences) for the role:     Knowledge of the risk and threats presented to the Company by counterfeiting Knowledge of tactics utilized by counterfeiters to infiltrate the legitimate market with fake goods.    Understanding of anti - counterfeiting legislative practices, including prosecutorial options. Deep knowledge of approaches to brand protection matters and level of interest therein, and framework of Custom s practices at ports directly affecting product supplies.    Leadership: Ability to build effective internal and external networks, use the scale of P&G as well as all components of a multi - functional team, and exude a broad spirit of collaboration across all aspects.    Demonstrated willingness and integrity are paramount, as is the ability to influence resources and ensure clear communication of unwavering progress towards goals & objectives.    Communication: Strong verbal and written communications skills.    Innovation & Critical Thinking    Attention to Detail: Ability to maintain consistent awareness ofcompliance to policy & procedure, FCPA requirements, WBCM, etc, demonstrated unquestioned integrity, are critical attributes.    Financial Acumen: Ownership of objectives through exhibiting a quality thinking & management approach. description: Job description  Email marketing manager to take the lead with our email marketing strategies. We have a team of professionals who are experts in checking the quality of our range before dispatching the same at the client?s end. company: Society Tea today is the market leader in the Tea category in Maharashtra, and has become a dominant force, with around 40% market share of packaged tea in the state. To ensure this consistent quality, three members of the family have dedicated their lives as full time tea tasters.Our quest for better quality goes on for our new range of Dairy Products, One Minute Tea and Instant Tea (Premix). To manufacture high quality Tea and Dairy products, we have set up a plant in Vadodara (Gujarat). This plant is one of India's most advanced and completely automated milk and soluble tea processing units which manufactures these products under strict hygienic standards, to meet our high levels of quality and excellence. We see this new range as the products of the future.

company: Leading Client
description: Job descriptionWe have some urgent requirement for Nephrologist. Details of the Vacancies are as below : Location : Jalandhar (Punjab). Position : Nephrologist Qualification : DM - Nephrology Experience : Any Package : Negotiable (Depends upon the experience) Job Responsibilities : - Core duties is establishing a plan of care for kidney patients. It's centered around slowing the progress of kidney disease, and incorporates diet and lifestyle changes, as well as close control over medications. - Many common drugs used to treat other diseases can aggravate kidney disease, including over-the-counter painkillers.- The nephrologist must review all of a patient's medications to minimize unnecessary risks, and identify potentially harmful interactions between otherwise-beneficial drugs. - Nephrologists must also coordinate care with physicians treating other conditions, such as high blood pressure, diabetes or anaemia that contribute to or result from kidney disease. - Chronic kidney disease results in diminished kidney function over time, with the rate of deterioration varying from case to case- When the kidneys become seriously impaired, the nephrologist will usually order a course of dialysis, which mechanically cleanses the blood in much the same way healthy kidneys do. Ultimately, many patients require a kidney transplant to survive. - The transplant surgery is performed by a urologist, but the nephrologist is responsible for managing the patient's care before and after the surgery, Work Experience : 0 - 10 YearsRoleNephrologist,Industry TypeMedical, Healthcare, Hospitals,Functional AreaMedical, Healthcare, R&D, Pharmaceuticals, Biotechnology,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryMedical ProfessionalEducationUG :Any Graduate in Any SpecializationPG :DM in Clinical PharmacologyDoctorate :Doctorate Not RequiredKey SkillsNephrologyNephrologistDMKidney Care

description: Job descriptionIndustrial Maintenance Mechanic Job Duties : - Ensures operation of machinery and mechanical equipment by completing preventive maintenance requirements on engines, motors, pneumatic tools, conveyor systems, and production machines; following diagrams, sketches, operations manuals, manufacturer's instructions, and engineering specifications; troubleshooting malfunctions. - Locates sources of problems by observing mechanical devices in operation; listening for problems; using precision measuring and testing instruments. - Removes defective parts by dismantling devices; using hoists, cranes, and hand and power tools; examining form and texture of parts. - Determines changes in dimensional requirements of parts by inspecting used parts; using rules, calipers, micrometers, and other measuring instruments. - Adjusts functional parts of devices and control instruments by using hand tools, levels, plumb bobs, and straightedges. - Controls downtime by informing production workers of routine preventive maintenance techniques; monitoring compliance. - Fabricates repair parts by using machine shop instrumentation and equipment. - Maintains equipment, parts, and supplies inventories by checking stock to determine inventory level; anticipating needed equipment, parts, and supplies; placing and expediting orders; verifying receipt. - Conserves maintenance resources by using equipment and supplies as needed to accomplish job results.Provides mechanical maintenance information by answering questions and requests. - Prepares mechanical maintenance reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing information and trends. - Maintains technical knowledge by attending educational workshops; reviewing technical publications. company: WIND WORLD INDIA (Formerly Enercon)COMPANY PROFILE : Wind World (India) Ltd [Formerly Known as Enercon India Ltd] has a global slogan 'CLEAN ENERGY FOREVER'. The origins of our story begin in 1994, way before the first gusts of an energy crisis began blowing across our land. It was a time when wind energy emerged not as an alternative, but a mainstream, renewable, eco-friendly source of power generation. Since then we've emerged as the country's preferred wind power solution provider; on a number of counts. Wind World (India) Limited has always been a path breaker, with innovations that have consistently left the others behind. Gearless technology; an energy-efficient grid feeding system and long-lasting warp resistant blades are just cases in point. Our wind farms today straddle seven high wind potential states - Karnataka, Maharashtra, Tamil Nadu, Rajasthan, Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh and Andhra Pradesh spread across 3,000 kms of India. We have installed over 5300 + Wind Energy Converters (WECs) with a installed capacity of over 4000 MW. We are maintaining these WECs round the clock 365 x 24 x 7 for optimum performance. We are an ISO 9001:2008 certified company for Manufacturing, Installations and Services, to have seamless growth of business operations SAP system has been implemented for all major business functions. The company has four manufacturing units at Daman for different parts of Wind Energy Converter and concrete tower segment manufacturing facilities at Gujarat & Karnataka. With a proud team of around 6000 highly skilled WinDirecters the company is poised to meet high market demand. Today wind energy is rated as the fastest growing source of power in the world, with an average growth exceeding the rate of 40% per annum over the last few years worldwide.URL: www.windworldindia.com JOIN US!!

description: Job description  ABOUT US: MEDIA.NET   Media.net is a leading global technology company that develops innovative software, apps, platforms and advertising products for both publishers and advertisers. Since its founding, Media.net has made substantial investments in the ad-tech space and built one of the most comprehensive portfolios in the industry across search, mobile, apps, software, display, native, local, products and video. Its platform and products are licensed by some of the largest publishers, ad networks and other ad tech companies worldwide.     By market cap, Media.net is one of the Top 5 largest ad tech companies worldwide and has 1,300+ employees in key operation centers across - New York, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Miami, Dubai, Zurich, Mumbai, Pune and Bangalore. Media.net's US HQ is based in New York, and Global HQ in Dubai.     Media.net has been acquired by a Chinese Consortium for $900 Million USD in the 3rd Largest Ad Tech deal ever and this acquisition will fuel Media.net's global expansion strategy and provide access to China's world-class talent and capital markets.     Media.Net has the culture of a startup with the cash-flow and resources of a larger organization. Unlike many of the unicorns we're actually profitable & growing at an exponential pace! We have a flat hierarchy, excellent workplace facilities (free gym, food, bean bags, pool tables, TT tables, library, chill-zones), no dress-codes, competitive remuneration / benefits. It's a great place to work, learn new stuff and make great friends.     Learn more at: http://careers.media.net/         ABOUT THE JOB - EXECUTIVE SECRETARY    Location - Mumbai, India      We are looking for an experienced, highly-responsive Executive Secretary to provide flawless support to our Business Head.     Executive Responsibilities:   Being the point person for the Executive and efficiently completing all assigned tasks  Ensuring a high level of confidentiality while communicating with internal stakeholders and external partners      Calendar Management:   Managing the Executive's calendar and daily schedule, demonstrating flexibility and problem-solving abilities to adjust or prioritize schedules as required  Assisting in planning and organizing meetings by taking responsibility for organizing the agenda, finalizing the location, accommodating technology requirements based on participant needs, and all other meeting logistics. May be required toprepare meeting briefing documents including taking and disseminating notes and formulating post-meeting action item list      Travel Management:   Coordinating flights, hotel reservations, visas, detailed travel itineraries , currency management while maintaining expense reports      Correspondence:   Prepare professional business communication documents including memos, letters and emails  Act as a proxy for communications and approvals as authorized      Other Responsibilities:   Maintain documents, reports, presentations and briefs as required  Assist on general administrative duties to optimize workflow process  Partner with HR, Facilities, Finance and IT to effectively resolve tasks        WHO CAN APPLY FOR THIS JOB?    Executive Secretary with minimum 4 - 5 years of relevant experience  Strong interpersonal skills, to interface and thrive within a fast-paced, deadline-oriented, creative environment  Detail oriented, analytical thinker with great organizational and scheduling skills  Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Office  Ability to multi-task and handle conflicting priorities seamlessly  Able to maintain confidentiality better than a secret service agent :)   RoleSecretary/PA,Industry TypeIT-Software, Software Services,Functional AreaExecutive Assistant, Front Office, Data Entry,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryOtherEducationUG :Any Graduate in Any Specialization, Graduation Not RequiredPG :Any Postgraduate in Any Specialization, Post Graduation Not RequiredDoctorate :Any Doctorate in Any Specialization, Doctorate Not RequiredKey SkillsBusiness CommunicationAdministrationSecretarial ActivitiesProblem SolvingTravel ManagementCurrency Management

description: Job descriptionWSP is looking immediate joiner for Personal Assistant .Below given is the job Description read carefully if found suitable share your updated resume along with details.Job DescriptionYou will be responsible for  providing a high level of professional administrative and business support to at  least six Strategic Business Unit (SBU) Directors. You will be expected to  deliver on administrative tasks, provide succinct and effective support using a  flexible and adaptable approach. You  will have the ability to use your own initiative, prioritise tasks and  collaborate well with other UK teams and iCRC colleagues in seeing that tasks  are completed to a high standard, allowing Directors to focus on their core  activities and make best use of their time. You will have an eye for detail and  the ability to work independently, quickly and efficiently.  Core Functions &  Requirements:   Extensive and complex diary  management across multiple time zones   Organise and coordinate meetings ensuring  meeting rooms, facilities and logistics are established. Prepare and distribute agendas and documents  in good time.   Provide Directors with relevant  information required for all meetings (meeting content, travel directions,  documents etc.)  Demonstrate the necessary  knowledge of WSP's systems and processes, function as first point of contact  for questions.   Assist Directors with the completion  of expenses, timesheets and absences.   Responsible for arranging UK  and international travel, including visas, flights, accommodation, car hire using  WSP's approved Travel Provider   Ensure all H&S paperwork  requirements and PDRs are completed for Directors  Liaise with the UK and iCRC  Administration Shared Service team to deliver marketing material, proposal  documents, reports and presentations ensuring quality and consistency of output  and in meeting WSP's brand guidelines.  Proactively contribute to  ensuring a safe and healthy working environment Qualifications and Work  Experience:   Degree qualified   Extensive experience in  delivering a high-quality business administration service in demanding and  pressurised environments. Previous experience in similar roles considered.  A desire to work in a fast-paced  environment  Strong written and verbal  communication skills  Professional Services /  Consultancy / Engineering background is desired   Fully conversant to an  advanced level in the complete Microsoft Suite including Outlook, Word, PowerPoint  and Excel. Use of Microsoft Teams, One Note, One Drive is desirable. The following skills are essential:   Clear communicator   Excellent attention to detail  Ability to plan, problem solve  and work independently   Strong collaborator with the ability  to create a strong effective network across the organisation   Ability to demonstrate  discretion always  Excellent organisation and  interpersonal skills with the ability to meet deadlines   The ability and willingness to  provide support and collaborate with other Virtual Assistants and support staff  during times of heavy workload and absences Behaviours & interpersonal skills    Behaves in a way that is  consistent with WSP's values - with fairness, honesty and integrity  Maintains confidentiality at  all times   Works well under pressure, self-reliant and able to use own initiative   Adaptability in adjusting to the allocated directors' specific ways of  working   Learns from experience and takes on board constructive feedback   Demonstrates an interest in learning new things and maintains professional  development  Positive personality and a  self-starter  Demonstrates the ability and  willingness to take ownership and responsibility   Possess a professional and  confident manner and acts with integrity Experience: 3-6 yrsJob Location: BengaluruRole: 6 Months ContractOffice Timing: 10 AM -7 PM(General shifts)Cab Facility: NoRegardsAkanksha GuptaRecruitment CoordinatorWSP India9650891337RoleSecretary/PA,Industry TypeIT-Software, Software Services,Functional AreaExecutive Assistant, Front Office, Data Entry,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryOtherEducationUG :Any Graduate in Any SpecializationPG :Post Graduation Not Required, Any Postgraduate in Any SpecializationDoctorate :Doctorate Not Required, Any Doctorate in Any SpecializationKey Skillspersonal secretaryExecutive AssistantPAPersonal AssistanceExecutive Secretary
