description: Job description*     They act as a liaison officer between a patient and other personnel for the smooth functioning of the ward.    Scope of the department     To manage the admission to discharge process ( from Inception to completion)   To co-ordinate with the medical, nursing team and managerial service in carrying out the needs of all in-patients.   To manage the entire discharge / Death/ DAMA/ LAMA process.    Activities on patients Admission.     Ward secretary to update of boards specifying patient detail for each unit   Fix up appointment for different investigations as instructed by the doctor    Ward secretary to arrange transport (stretcher or wheel chair) and sending the patient to concerned departments for investigations.    Ward secretaries coordinate the patient shifting process to other ward after recovery      Inform the patient attendant about the patient shifting to other wards   Orient the patient attendant about the bad category and guide them to admission counter for consent.   To book the bed as per the desire category.   To shift the patient on availability of bed     Activities During patient s stay. Ward Secretaries are responsible for     Collecting and compilation of reports.   Visiting patients / attendant and co-ordinate with other department in attending to the patient s need. Ward secretary is the first to receive any complaints and escalate to the next higher authority if UN resolved.   Ensuring that a neat and tidy ambience is maintained.   Carrying out doctor s instruction.   Maintaining required stock of stationary items.   Updating the billing cards on daily basis. Ensure the closure of all services.   Attending phone calls.   X-Ray films to be sent to the X-Ray department for reporting and to be collected of the same at the end of the day.   Maintaining the case files of the patient neatly with all necessary case papers, investigation reports and billing cards etc.   Taking the appointment for any procedures i.e. Radiology, EEG, PFT, Cardiology procedures.   Updating the secretary logbook with all necessary information ( discharge, admission , patient shifting)   Completion of Medical record folder after patient discharge.   Submission of investigation report to Billing for Corporate, CGHS and other insurance patient   Collecting/dispatching blue folders to medical records.   Orienting the patient s relatives regarding the double occupancy and its tariff when the patients get shifted to CCU/ICU/HDU.   Coordinating with admission counter for admission and transfer of patient s when they are in emergency.   Cancellation of any services which are wrongly raised by sisters in coordination with IT department.   As per Doctor s advice ward secretaries are coordinating with Nimbus Bed Company for providing the same.   Printing the labels for all patients as per the requirement.    Activities of the ward secretary at the time of patients discharge     Co-coordinating with the nurses and pharmacy, sending the updated billing card to the billing department after obtaining indents and returns of medicines.   Explaining the relatives regarding the discharge guidelines.   Co-coordinating with junior doctors and senior doctors for preparing the discharge summary.   Typing the discharge summary and signed by the concerned consultant & initiate the discharge in EHIS.   Discharge summary to be approved by PAT (Prescription Audit Team) with the file.   At the time of discharge, pending reports to be collected.   Coordinating with, HR department, Emergency department and security if the patient needs ambulance for transportation.   Coordination with the transport to make arrangements for wheel chair/stretcher/luggage trolley if necessary.   Collecting feedback forms from all discharge patients.   On physical discharge of the patient, intimation to be given to admission, housekeeping & maintenance.   Check out to be done in EHIS.   Room check out to be done on readiness of the room.    Dearth Procedure     Death declared by the consultant and intimated through EHIS.   To coordinating with telephone exchange to help relatives/attendants in making phone calls.   Update and send the billing card at the earliest with return medicine (*by ward pharmacist) to inform billing department about the expiry so that the bills can be prepared without delay.   Inform the following departments -billing, guest relations, security, waiting admission, dietary, housekeeping medical records department.   Co-ordinate with waiting hall personnel to regulate the attendants and to explain to the relatives about the billing formalities and other if any and guide the relatives till the end.    Taking the personal information of the patient for the death certificate.   Get three copies of the death certificates filled by the concerned doctor who attended the patient at the time of death , (death certificate-original to be given to the relative only in case of non MLC, second copy will be sent with the body, and third copy to be sent to medical records).   Coordinate with the PCAs regarding the packing of Dead body.   Coordinate with security and make arrangements for transport to take the body.   Ensure that the bills are settled and hand over the original death certificate to the relative.   Coordinate with nursing, security and housekeeping to send the body to mortuary/ambulance.   Check up and make sure that the death form, death certificate, and death summary are properly filled and send the folder to medical records within 24 hours.   If it is a medico legal case, death certificate not to be handed over to the relative or to the police. Excellent calendar management skills,  including the coordination of complex blend of assignments.

Experience scheduling travel arrangements.

Support experience in MIS/  Business Analysis.

Communicate and handle incoming and outgoing electronic communications.

Be responsible for interaction with both internal and external executives and assistants,  as well as consultants,  to coordinate a variety of complex executive meetings/  assignments.

Prioritize and manage multiple projects simultaneously,  and follow through on issues in a timely manner.

To arrange,  coordinate & set- up all meetings and conferences.

Conduct Board Meetings and General Meetings.

Maintenance of all the secretarial records/  statutory Registers

Good Communication skills in English,  Marathi & Hindi is a must

Candidate is preferred from the Central Suburbs or Navi Mumbai

Education- 

UG: Any Graduate /   Post Graduate

Strong knowledge of MS Office,  including Word,  Excel,  PowerPoint and Outlook.

Experience assisting management with the creation of PowerPoint presentations.

Excellent communication skills,  both verbal and written.

Should possess good ability to work with strategic mindset.

Shorthand and excellent typing skills,  speed and accuracy are desired.

Professional communication skills are essential.

Ability to work under pressure and to tight deadlines.

Presentable and Confident personality.

Flexible and mature approach with ability to work unsupervised.

description: Job description  About the Position      Looking for an experienced, competent, enthusiastic and qualified candidate to join KPMG Global Delivery Center in Bangalore. S/he should have proven stakeholder management and influencing skills in a global work environment.       Broadly, the key responsibilities are:     Leadership Support:     Travel Management - Responsible for managing travel (Domestic and International) includes Flights/Web Check-in / Hotel / Cabs / Forex / Travel Insurance/Visa/Matrix phones/Meeting rooms for Directors supported and for team as and when required; Support extended teams through system PO and query management   Finance support - Raising PR/POs, Invoice tracking, PO receipting, follow up on payments, print, scan, file agreements and tax documents Calendar Management - Manage calendar, arrange meetings, book meeting/VC rooms (different locations), raise VC support requests and other administrative support activities   Expense Management - Processing Expenses on ReKonnect for Directors and above.        Other administrative support:       Visitor Management - All end to end activities (pre-trip to closure of visit) - logistics arrangements such as access cards, meetings rooms, invites, infrastructure set up, ordering meals, accommodation ground transfers   Event Management - Managing events for the BU or function as SPOCs for firm wide events. End to end logistics management for all internal connect sessions, town halls by visiting leadership, offsite support, etc.   Operational Activities - Manage centralized administrative BU activities - E.g. Vendor onboarding, Costs transfers (OPE), Trackers on visitors for their respective Directors. GDC leadership/Managers Birthday and Wedding Anniversary arrangements. Operational activities are generally ongoing activities in addition to secretarial specific activities.   KPMG Systems - Acquire knowledge of KPMG tools and methodologies required for the job - E.g. ReKonnect, Concur, Swift, Yatra, Room booking, Support Central, Intranet Sites, etc.   Corporate Functions - work closely with other enabling functions like Admin, Traveldesk, IT, Finance, HR, LD, Risk and also co-ordinate with EAs from other BUs as necessary       Educational Requirements     Graduate and 5 years of post-qualification experience       Experience Requirements and competencies     Strong written and verbal communication skills   Should have experience in supporting global leadership   Good knowledge of MS-Excel, MS-PowerPoint and MS-Word   Strong time management skills to meet challenging timeline   Ability to multi-task given support is extend to multiple leaders   Ability to build and maintain relationships within team and other departments   Positive approach towards learning   Should have attention to detail  RoleSecretary/PA,Industry TypeAccounting, Finance,Functional AreaExecutive Assistant, Front Office, Data Entry,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryOtherEducationUG :Any Graduate in Any SpecializationPG :Post Graduation Not RequiredKey SkillsAdministrationForexExpense managementTravel managementLogistics managementStakeholder managementPowerpointOperationsTravel insuranceAuditing

Since from the establishment, it has been highly regarded for its expertise and innovation in the staffing industry.Sarthee Consultancy mostly focus on Executive Search Solutions for Managerial & Top management positions in all verticals. Maintaining transparency & confidentiality at client & candidate end has become our working philosophy.Today, Sarthee Consultancy has become a Professional Leader through its commitment to provide successful Recruitment solutions to multinational & Domestic Companies. By making a mark, we have grown to be presented in most of Industries & Functional domains. company: Bliss GVS is a fast-growing Pharmaceutical Company with a proven track record of developing, manufacturing and marketing high quality pharmaceutical formulations at affordable prices for the global market. We are a public limited company listed on India's National Stock Exchange and Bombay Stock Exchange with more than three decades of industry expertise.We are among the world leaders in Suppositories and Pessaries dosage forms with one of the largest portfolios in this segment. Over the last decade, we have acquired definitive know-how in other dosage forms & therapeutic segments, which is exemplified by our ever-expanding product offering across more than sixty countries.With significant expansion in R & D, Manufacturing & Marketing capabilities, we are poised for an accelerated rate of growth which makes for very exciting times at Bliss GVS.
description: Job description We are looking        for a versatile, high-energy professional, holding over 20+ years of        experience in  Strategic        Business Planning, Business Development, Market / Competitor        Analysis/Market Penetration, Key Account Management, Cross-functional        Team Management,    Strategic        Alliances & Partnerships  etc . in    International        markets (Africa, CIS, Middle east, emerging & regulated markets). Responsible        to maximize corporate performance, driving growth, generating revenues        and capturing market share. description: Job descriptionAs  an Consultant, you will be responsible for supporting Merger & Acquisition M&A,  due diligence and investment-related consulting projects and ensuring on-time  and on-budget delivery for clients in the pharmaceutical or related industries  by:Leveraging business and transaction advisory experience and methodological  expertise to support with preparing proposals and delivering projects to  address client questions, primarily in the areas of due diligence (buy- and  sell-side), asset/portfolio/company valuation, asset screening and growth  strategy.Supporting  the management project teams including both internal and external resources, in  the design, development and delivery of client deliverables.Contributing to the day-to-day development of client reports and presentations  and delivery of significant portions of findings to clientServing as  the lead on small projects/workstreams, ensuring successful delivery, project  satisfaction and leading presentation of key outputs to the client.Supporting  overall FIC team and broader consulting initiatives to elevate our  capabilities, including (but not limited to) the development of intellectual  property, marketing materials, training, recruitment and go-to-market approach.Support  with business development, including proposal development and presentationsSupport development of company engagement with financial investors across areas within and outside of  consulting services.Contribute to business development, including proposal development and  presentations.     Required Candidate profileGraduate/Post-graduate  Degree in Life Sciences/Engineering/Business from a premier institute 2+ years professional experience in consulting, corporate development, or  within a financial institution (e.g. private equity, venture capital) with a  focus on M&A (Merger & Acquisition) / commercial due diligence within the pharmaceutical and/or  healthcare sector  Minimum of  1-2 years project management experience focused on engagements related to  transactions / external investments (due diligence, valuation, asset  identification, growth strategy, forecasting), including capabilities to manage  large and/or multiple projects while balancing priorities while maintaining  high quality delivery  Evidence  of career progression in consulting and/or transaction advisory roles  Experience  working in multi-disciplined teams and responsibility for leading workstreams   Demonstrable analytical, interpretative and problem-solving skills  Knowledge  of consulting methodologies, tools and techniques  Strong  quantitative skillset and comfortable interpreting financial results /  P&Ls, with ability to translate data analysis and qualitative insights into  strategic implications for senior investors   Well-developed written and verbal communication skills including presentations,  chairing meetings, workshop facilitation, business and report writing  Knowledge  of key issues and current developments in the pharmaceutical and healthcare  industries  Experience advising clients in the  pharmaceutical/healthcare industry and/or financial investors In addition to the skills and  experience above a Consultant should have: Fluency in  English (spoken and written)Advanced  skills in Microsoft OfficeAbility to  break down complex problems into simple tasksAbility to  work under pressure with limited supervision and produce timely, high quality  deliverables in a fast-paced environmentAbility to  lead projects/ teams and across domainsA  willingness and ability to travelKnowledge  of Datasets and business use cases is a plusMBA not required but a plusNote:- This is a role of Consulting, not a role of FP & A (Financial Planning & Analysis).Perks and BenefitsNegotiableRoleCorporate Planning/Strategy Manager,Industry TypePharma, Biotech, Clinical Research,Functional AreaStrategy, Management Consulting, Corporate Planning,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryCorporate Planning/Consulting/StrategyEducationUG :Graduation Not Required, Any Graduate in Any SpecializationPG :Any Postgraduate in Any Specialization, Post Graduation Not RequiredDoctorate :Any Doctorate in Any Specialization, Doctorate Not RequiredKey Skillsproposal developmentstrategy planningcompany valuationm&abusiness developmentmergersgrowth strategyprimary researchsecondary researchcorporate planningbusiness consultingtransaction advisoryproposalsacquisitioncorporate strategy

description: Job descriptionJob Description : We are looking for a well-organized Site Engineer with strong leadership skills to join our growing team. company: Ormax Media was founded on July 28, 2008 by Vispy Doctor and Shailesh Kapoor. It is India\'s first and only insights firm specializing in the media & entertainment industry. The firm\'s work spans across categories such as television, films, radio, print and branded entertainment. Over the last five years, we have more than 20 products to cater to common industry needs
description:
Job descriptionThese positions (3 nos.) will entail working on a wide array of television & films projects,  in the areas of media analytics,  consumer insights (qualitative and quantitative) and media consulting. Projects for leading television and film companies in India will be assigned to this role. These will include projects across a variety of genres,  such as GECs,  niche television,  Bollywood,  Hollywood and regional content,  among others. The job will entail working on primary and/  or secondary data,  along with existing Ormax data and tools,  to deliver sound and strategically relevant business recommendations to the client in question.

The positions will be based out of Mumbai. A keen interest in media,  a curious mind full of ideas and questions,  good analytical skills and strong written & verbal communication skills are essentials for the role. Prior media experience,  while not a pre- requisite,  will be an added advantage. Candidates with 3- 7 years experience can apply. The positions offered will be at the level of Consultant,  Associate Consultant or Senior Executive,  depending on the quantum and relevance of past experience.RoleAnimation/Graphic Artist,Industry TypeMedia, Entertainment, Internet,Functional AreaTV, Films, Production, Broadcasting,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryProduction/TechnicalEducationUG :Any Graduate in Any SpecializationPG :Any Postgraduate in Any SpecializationKey SkillsAnalytical skillsCVSSenior ExecutiveConsultingConsumer insightsAnalyticsConsulting Associate

company: Fabelizer creates magical visual experiences for young children. Our guiding vision is to create a global community of children bound by strong morals and values through visual content. By creating heroes that embody values like friendship,  generosity and courage,  the Fabelizer brand will be synonymous with safe,  non- violent,  non- stereotypical and unadulterated content for children. Fabelizer is committed to creating impact for children across the world,  by giving them quality content to learn from and be entertained by. We believe that social impact is not only about poverty but about exclusion from society. For too long the needs of young children have been neglected in the media industry. Fabelizer aims to resolve this issue by creating quality content dedicated to children in a consolidated and scalable manner.

company: Fabelizer Inc.
description:
Job description    Fabelizer is looking for movie Directors who can make children movies for global audiences. If you are imaginative,   and can lead others to work towards your creative vision,   this job could be for you. Directors have overall responsibility for the way films are made. As a Director,   you would use your creativity,   organizational skills and technical knowledge to manage the whole production process. As you would be leading a team of people with very different roles,   in this job you would need good communication skills. You need to be very organized and good at planning. You would also need to make quick decisions,   manage your time well and keep to your budget.   
You will lead a large team of animators and also coordinate closely with our creative team in London to direct full-  length feature films,   television programmes and internet webisodes. Your main purpose would be to make the creative decisions that guide the production team.   
 
All applicants must undergo a 1 week traineeship program before you are selected for the position.   
 
RESPONSIBILITIES:    
  Translate scripts into storyboards/  animatics.  
  Creative planning and design of the production and quality of the final delivered product.  
  Work in sync with the entire Art team & Animation team and lead creative choices with respect to the design,   storyboard,   layout,   animation and post-   production departments.  
  Responsible for all aspects of sound design,   including casting and directing the voice actors,   theme song,   soundtrack and background score.  
  Oversee the film\'s broad visionmdash style,   tone,   color palettemdashand supervise with every aspect of the production process.  
  Supervise the edit to produce the final \'cut\'.  

   Requirements  

   Minimum 5-  8 years of work experience as an Assistant Director or 5-  8 years of work experience as Associate Producer/  Director for animation films or television series.  
 
  Brownie points if you have directed an animated project:   TV commercial,   short film,   music video etc.  
  RoleAssistant Director/Director,Industry TypeMedia, Entertainment, Internet,Functional AreaTV, Films, Production, Broadcasting,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryProduction/TechnicalEducationUG :Any Graduate in Any SpecializationPG :Post Graduation Not RequiredKey Skillslayoutplanningmusiccutdirectorfilmgoodpost productionand qualityanimation
qualification: ['UG :Any Graduate in Any Specialization', 'PG :Post Graduation Not Required']

description:
Job description

movie Directors who can make children movies for global audiences.  If you are imaginative,  and can lead others to work towards your creative vision,  this job could be for you.  Directors have overall responsibility for the way films are made.  As a Director,  you would use your creativity,  organizational skills and technical knowledge to manage the whole production process.  As you would be leading a team of people with very different roles,  in this job you would need good communication skills.  You need to be very organized and good at planning.  You would also need to make quick decisions,  manage your time well and keep to your budget.  

You will lead a large team of animators and also coordinate closely with our creative team in London to direct full-length feature films,  television programmes and internet webisodes.  Your main purpose would be to make the creative decisions that guide the production team.  

RESPONSIBILITIES: 

Translate scripts into storyboards/ animatics.  

Creative planning and design of the production and quality of the final delivered product.  

Work in sync with the entire Art team & Animation team and lead creative choices with respect to the design,  storyboard,  layout,  animation and post- production departments.  

Responsible for all aspects of sound design,  including casting and directing the voice actors,  theme song,  soundtrack and background score.  

Oversee the film's broad vision style,  tone,  color palette and supervise with every aspect of the production process.  

Supervise the edit to produce the final 'cut'.  

Requirements

Minimum 5 8 years of work experience as an Assistant Director or 5-8 years of work experience as Associate Producer/ Director for animation films or television series. 

Brownie points if you have directed an animated project: TV commercial,  short film,  music video etc.

description:
Job descriptionDescription: Role and responsibilities :- 

Planning and preparing courses and lessons. Maintaining up to date subject knowledge related to CBSE preparation for Classes 10th to 12th. 

Be proactively involved in teaching students. 

Motivating, facilitating, teaching, according to the pupil's educational needs. 

Plan, prepare and present lessons that cater to the needs of the whole ability range within their class. Preparing weekly assignments for each batch assigned to him/ her. 

Timely correction and marking of assignment work carried out by the students in class and elsewhere. 

Assessing, recording and reporting on the development and progress of students. 

Communicating, consulting and providing feedback to the parents of students during PTM or as and when the requirement /  need arises. Desired Candidate Profile : 

Candidates with School Teaching Experience along with experience in scholastic exam training will be preferred. 

Candidates must have a clear understanding of teaching and learning needs of Foundation 

Course students, who need to excel in School as well as Competitive Exams. 

Candidates with a habit of continuous self learning will be preferred. 

Must possess excellent presentation and English communication skills. 

It is our privilege to share that Young Scholars (YS) Group of Institutes, one of the most renowned and trusted names in the field of Education situated in the Malwa Belt of Punjab, are imparting Quality Education in this area for last 35 years through YS School Barnala (Affiliated to CBSE since 1996) YS Genxt School , Barnala (Pre-nry to 1st) YS Public School Handiaya (Affiliated to CBSE since 2002) YS College running BBA, BCA, BCom and BSC (IT) Courses YS Group is guided under the leadership of an IITian as Director, who has rich experience with best of the organizations such as Bharti Group and McKinsey&Co, and MBBS as Academic Director whose focus is always to ensure the delivery of quality education to students at every step so to extend very high standards of Education.

Barnala, Punjab, India

company: The Shiv Nadar Foundation (www.shivnadarfoundation.org) launched the Shiv Nadar Schools that are sculpted to deliver educational excellence in consonance with the needs of the 21st century school students. Shiv Nadar School, Gurgaon and Noida began operations in the academic year 2012-13 followed by Shiv Nadar School, Faridabad in 2015-16. The first three schools in the NCR have been developed as model schools and will create the institutional knowledge and wisdom in terms of educational practices, systems and processes with a view to be effectively scalable as we grow into other cities and towns of India in the coming decade. Shiv Nadar School intends to make an enduring impact in the field of K-12 (Kindergarten to Grade 12) education in India by establishing a pan Indian chain of quality schools that will provide children with a platform to excel and become leaders in the fast changing environment of modern times. All endeavors at Shiv Nadar Schools have the essence of 'Education for Life' flowing through them. Our motto serves as our voice of conscience, constantly motivating us to realize the unique interests, talents and potential of each child. We believe that an academic environment suited to discover a child's natural proclivities, helps him or her evolve into an individual who is well-poised to deal with all challenges of life and become a contributing citizen.
description: Job descriptionGood knowledge and teaching experience of Python for senior classes mandatory.  Plan, prepare and deliver lesson plans and instructional materials that  facilitate active learning.  Instruct and monitor students in the use of learning materials and  equipment.  Use relevant technology to support and differentiate instruction.  Manage student behavior in the classroom by establishing rules and  procedures.  Organizing the classroom and learning resources and creating displays to  encourage a positive learning environment.  Planning, preparing and presenting lessons that cater for the needs of  the different ability range within their class.  Organizing and taking part in school events, outings and activities.  Stay up to date with the change in structure of curriculum as per CBSE.  To be responsible for the course completion, assessment (setting of  paper, correction, report writing), collection of evidences of learning for  their respective students and meeting parents.  Preparing and marking work to facilitate positive student development.  Discussing feedback of the students with the parents in meetings held  time to time.  Prepare classroom for class activities.  Observe and evaluate student's performance and development.  Assign and grade class work, homework, tests and assignments.  Communicate necessary information regularly to students, colleagues and  parents regarding student progress and student needs.  Meeting requirements for the assessment and recording of students  development.  Adhere to all the policies in force or introduced from time to time and  actively implement the same.  Perform any other task assigned by the Principal/School authorities to  ensure smooth functioning of the Department and school. description: Job descriptionGreetings from Navayuga Consultancy Services...!!!Openings for TCS - Delivery Head and Individual Contributor (Cargo Revenue and Dispute management) Location: Gurgaon Team Member(Individual Contributor):* Shift Timings : Night Shift; 6:00 pm to 7:00 am window (or As per business requirement)* Qualification: Any Graduate with Cargo Revenue and Dispute management experienceJob requirement* Must have atleast 3-5 years of  Cargo Revenue and Dispute management experience* Good written and verbal communication is a must* IATA certification will be an added advantage* Manage complex activities*Analysis based decision making, should be able to understand Airway bill, different procedures and jargons in cargo industry and should be able to resolve disputes rising due to it*  Review and approve documents, transactions and work papers* Execution of tasks, highlighting issues to leader, provide first call resolution to the customerJob DescriptionReconciling the invoices and disputes, dispute management, communication different departments for the resolutionReview and resolve any disputesResearch and reconcile the accounts Liaison with different departments for clarification and resolution   Delivery Head  Preferred   Experience Range   Graduate with minimum 10 years of   relevant Airlines Cargo work experience.Skill Set:   Must have extremely strong knowledge in Airlines Cargo operations Must have excellent communication skills Must have managed international clients Strong analytical skills required as well as the ability to take statistical data and infer organizational implications required  Proven ability to make sound business judgments  Team Player with Strong Performance Management abilities Create and implement processes that result in improved business performance Strong execution skills with focus on clear, realistic action steps and timeliness Strong working knowledge of Ms Excel and PowerPoint Strong Verbal and written communication Ability to work effectively in ambiguity, shifting priorities and multiple deadlines. Possess excellent interpersonal skills. Should have experience with Transitioning big projects Strong interpersonal skills as well as verbal and written skills required Knowledge of the credit industry and what motivates consumers is preferred as well as an understanding of business financial levers. Manage and exceed all metrics including Efficiency, Effectiveness, Availability, Adherence and Billing goals.Participate in various projects and continuous process improvement activities. Travel for QBR presentations and as and when required Flexibility of travel for long term projects and Delivery Set ups.Represent Delivery in Sales function for the above mentioned offerings. description: Job description  - Urgently required Creative Graphic Designer for our organisation.   - Excellent knowledge of Photoshop, Corel Draw, with Hindi & English Typing.   - Must be self-motivated & independent in doing routing designing work.   - Good knowledge of latest designing software's are must.   Salary is no bar for deserving candidate.   Responsibilities and Duties :   - Designing of day to day routine work   - Client coordination   - Good Team Player      Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications:     - Excellent knowledge of Photoshop, Corel Draw, with Hindi & English Typing.   - Must be self-motivated & independent in doing routing designing work.   - Good knowledge of latest designing software's are must.   - Branding, Visualization, UI Designer, Photoshop, Animation, Illustrator   Responsibilities:   - Improve the look and feel of interactive computers and product software   - Create overall concepts for the user experience within a business webpage or product, ensuring all interactions are intuitive and easy for customers   - Analyze customer responses and website data to determine high traffic web pages and why some perform better than others   - Design the aesthetics to be implemented within a website or product, from the layout menus and drop-down options to colors and fonts   - Build storyboards to conceptualize designs and convey project plans to clients and management   - Account for and track the human-computer interaction (HCI) element of a design   - Create surveys for research through various social media platforms to gather feedback on users ease of use   - Conduct testing of completed applications, websites and software to Assess user experience   Qualifications:   - 3-5 years of demonstrated experience in creating and implementing UI design   - Proficient with visual design programs such as Adobe Photoshop   - Ability to work effectively in a collaborative environment to create top-performing interfaces   - Experience creating storyboards and site mapping   - Advanced problem-solving skills and the ability to optimize data for the best possible outcome   - Ability to prioritize and manage multiple milestones and projects efficiently   - Professional written and interpersonal skills   - Continued education and research into UI trends and current design strategy and technology   - Experience with coding and ability to troubleshoot using HTML, CSS and comparable languages RoleGraphic Designer,Industry TypeIT-Software, Software Services,Functional AreaDesign, Creative, User Experience,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryCreativeEducationUG :B.Des. in Graphic DesignPG :M.Des. in Animation Film DesignDoctorate :Doctorate Not RequiredKey SkillsGraphics ArchitectureCSSMotion GraphicsUXIllustratorGraphics 3DAnimationHTMLPhotoshopHuman Computer Interaction

description: Job description As a graphic designer at Zenoti, you ll be responsible for the entire process of defining requirements, visualizing and creating graphics including layouts, illustrations, video storyboards, animated explainer videos and images. You ll be the one to define the visual aspects of our website pages, collateral, sales enablement tools, marketing ads, trade show display material and more. Your graphics should capture the attention of those who see them and communicate the right message. For this, you need to have a creative flair and a strong ability to translate requirements into design. If you can communicate well and work methodically as part of a team, we d love to meet you.    What will I be doing?     Conceptualize visuals based on requirements   Prepare rough drafts, storyboards and present ideas   Create marketing collateral, print design collateral, presentation decks, web pages,GIFs consistent with our branding   Develop illustrations, icons and other designs for marketing collateral. Ability to work around tight deadlines and prioritize tasks accordingly      You will receive a competitive salary and every employee receives equity in the company   You will receive medical coverage for yourself and your immediate family   We believe in holistic, enriching lives. We want you to work passionate, but sane hours. Our employees receive unlimited vacation, in turn we expect employees to act with integrity   Employees are served healthy breakfast, lunch and snacks on every weekday   Social activities are part of our culture; regular outings include company celebrations, team outings, movies, social work, outdoor activities and more  RoleGraphic Designer,Industry TypeIT-Software, Software Services,Functional AreaDesign, Creative, User Experience,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryCreativeEducationUG :Diploma in Graphic/ Web DesigningPG :Post Graduation Not RequiredKey SkillsGraphicsSoftware designGraphic designingNutritionIllustratorWellnessWeb designingPhotoshopMS OfficeFine arts

company: Why Join Techolution?Be part of the next most admired high tech brand in the world and launch the next most exciting billion dollar IPO. We are looking for talent with amazing technical skills with a great foundation for the open role. The type of personalities that do very well at our company are people who are looking to contribute to a larger than life cause. People who are looking for a very high growth environment where they are helping the company grow and also personally growing through a very unique and world-class exposure.Work Life at Techolution:At Techolution, we do things a bit differently. There's no corporate nonsense, and no old-fashioned hierarchy. Instead, we work in dozens of self-sufficient, autonomous teams. Think of them like start-ups within a start-up that learn from each other. You are your own boss! We're going to be upfront the way we work doesn't suit everyone. But if freedom, autonomy, and life-affirming, head-scratching professional challenges rock your world, we could be a match made in heaven.About Techolution:Techolution is a high-tech consulting company on a mission to accelerate digital transformation for our clients across the globe. We are a very successful start-up that is small enough to care and large enough to be trusted by some of the top brands in the world such as Apple, JPMC, DBS Bank, NBC, Stryker, JCrew, etc. Techolution specializes in UI Modernization, Cloud Transformation, Internet of Things, Big Data & Artificial Intelligence. As a testament to the power of HVPD, we have developed a wealth of world class products, owned by Techolution, in the space of Virtual Reality, Facial Recognition, Smart Water Monitoring and many more cutting edge digital products in the pipeline.Techolution currently serves clients across the United States with our headquarters in the heart of downtown New York City. We recently opened "Techolution City" in India as our offshore development center as a living and breathing lab for our IoT Smart City products. Techolution also serves APAC stormers from our Singapore office and the Mauritius office supports our initiatives on the African content.

company: Leading Client
description: Job descriptionJob Description : What you- ll be doing : This role is a blend of marketing, consulting, and predictive analytics for a Banking client.. The Data Analytics Senior Manager is an integral part of the model development team and is tasked with managing a team of analytic specialists that will design and develop the necessary processes to deliver high-quality insights that enable Client to improve how marketing investments impact business results. You will work closely with marketing functions including media, brand/creative, and consumer insights along with business teams, financial planning & analysis, and external partners to proactively design, develop and manage efforts from end-to-end. The end goal is to ensure strategic and tactical marketing decisions are informed by data-driven insights. - Manage and provide guidance to a team of 4 to 8 individuals to design/build/implement day-to-day processes, including data identification & collection, design, construction, implementation & maintenance of analytic frameworks, Risk, scorecard model development, implementation & maintenance, as well as interpretation and presentation of findings. - Build a best-in-class analytical roadmap that obtains both short-term and long-term objectives required to be a center of analytic excellence. - Work with Marketing Effectiveness leaders to determine business needs and objectives, and then design and complete analytical processes/solutions, in order to derive insights that can address stakeholders- stated objectives. - Develop both standardized and innovative tools to help facilitate the adoption of analytics among stakeholder groups across the marketing spectrum, from planning to execution. - Lead in the design, implementation, and interpretation of advanced multi-factor experiments to aid marketing decisions. - Lead the team efforts in delivering improvements in decision-making and business strategies via advanced analysis including ML algo, clustering, segmentation, point estimation, design experiments. - Present complex statistical concepts and research results to non-statistical audience. - Continually broaden and strengthen knowledge of analytical methods, vendors and tools. - Help foster a continuous test & learn culture and process - i.e. rapid cycle learning. . Required Candidate profileWhat my client is looking for : - Bachelor's degree/Masters degree or 8 or more years of work experience. - Experience designing, developing, maintaining and interpreting complex analytical techniques and insights. - Experience developing engagements with business partners. - Experience with SAS/R, ML Techniques, NLP or SAS and R programming language and software environments. Even better if you have: - A Degree in Statistics, Math, Economics or related field with 8 or more years of experience in business analytics. - Proven analytical skills in understanding and interpreting quantitative data, constructing Risk, Cross/Up sell, ARIMA, marketing mix models, providing clear output to identify trends, interpret findings, draw insights, and formulate recommendations. - Experience managing analytical talents to identify, prioritize, design, develop and implement advanced analytical solutions to complex business problems/opportunities in a deadline driven environment. - Experience developing solid engagements with business partners to facilitate and accelerate the adoption of analytics in decision making. - Experience making trade-offs to deliver effective solutions to business partners in a timely fashion. - Focus on accurate and timely results delivery by overcoming obstacles through the development of mechanisms and tools to improve efficiencies.RoleAnalytics Manager,Industry TypeBanking, Financial Services, Broking,Functional AreaAnalytics & Business Intelligence,Employment TypeFull Time, PermanentRole CategoryAnalytics & BIEducationUG :Any Graduate in Any SpecializationPG :Any Postgraduate in Any SpecializationDoctorate :Doctorate Not RequiredKey SkillsConsulting - BFSINLPSASData ManagementData AnalyticsStatisticsMachine LearningAnalyticsBusiness AnalysisPredictive Analytics
